title: Relativistic correction to the dissociation temperature of B_c mesons in the hot medium. (arXiv:2208.06986v2 [nucl-th] UPDATED)
description: By solving two body Dirac equations with potentials at finite temperature, we calculated the dissociation temperature T_d of B_c mesons in the quark-gluon plasma. It is found that the T_d becomes higher with the relativistic correction than the T_d from the Schroedinger equation. Both the short range interaction and the constant term of the potential at the long-range scale have a contribution to the shift of T_d, while the spin interaction is negligible.
dc:creator: Guangyu Li, Baoyi Chen, Yunpeng Liu
